nature: Distortion of Chesed that withholds compassion and replaces mercy with hardness and indifference
Distortion of Gevurah that refuses righteous action and collapses before injustice through cowardice
Distortion of Tiferet that creates discord and imbalance where beauty and harmony should reign
Distortion of Netzach that surrenders prematurely and abandons endurance when persistence is most needed
Distortion of Hod that claims divine credit for the self and refuses to acknowledge the sacred in others
Distortion of Yesod that severs the channel between spiritual intention and material manifestation
Distortion of Malkhut that prevents the divine presence from fully inhabiting the physical world
